    The 2023 Conference on Big Data and Artificial Intelligence

    IIIT Delhi
    December 7–9, 2023

    IIIT Delhi

    Welcome!

    BDA 2023 will take place in IIIT Delhi, India from December 7th to December 9th, 2023. The conference will be held in Hybrid mode.
